About Me

Let me tell you what I do....

Your Project Is in Safe Hands

Currently a mature student based in the National College of Ireland.
I chose to return to education motivating myself more as a individual. It sounds cheesy but it's true!
Where my life is turning next is a exciting road, and the aim is to get 110% career opportunities in visual and user experience we face every day as humans.

Promoter

Tried to bring left field beats to Dublin.
Realised there was too much techno and house same time.

Manager

Managed bars and cinemas to crazy productive hours of the day.

Bingo Caller

Former Bingo and Karaoke caller.
Pulp's Common People was my tune...

Testemonials

He just came up to me out of nowhere and was like do you like Playstation?
I replied yes it's better than PC.
The rest was history...
